author: carlversuslife
title: Perfect in Paris
text:
Just back from a wonderful 2 night stay in Hotel Ekta - the super friendly, perfectly located, simply sexual, modern, art-deco hotel. As you can see from the photographs the hotel oozes charisma, the map shows its perfect location and the reviews speak volumes for the service.
The hotel were extremely welcoming; assisting with bookings and 'extras' - all of the staff we dealt with were beyond perfection with great big smiles too. The room was a tidy and functional space (if a little small- I paid for a premium room but clearly got the smallest of the lot) and has built-in universal plug sockets as well as a multi-faceted USB charger besides the bed - a lovely touch. Skip the mini-bar and head to Monop' supermarket, just a 2 minute walk South (sorry, Ekta!) for better choice and prices.
I'd highly recommend Ekta to others as well as consider a return myself - it simply ticks all the boxes. Location, comfort, staff, price, style. Ekta is a solid 3 star hotel though how it only has 3 is staggering.... I guess the 4 or 5 provide a more pompous service rather than Ekta's welcoming, comforting, warm, classy, modern reception. Get yourself a reservation whilst its hot!!
Room Tip: The elevator is very slow; stay on a low floor if possible. See more room tips
